title: Scripter (Playing Sion Ranked
body: I found this Sion on my team, which was using scripts for his ult. I found this rather unfair and told the enemy team it was their bad luck. Unfornunately I wasn't able to record this as I didnt have my software ready but his IGN is HairyMoustache.

replies.body: [Read this before posting.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) You shouldn't name summoners that you want reported on the boards. Instead, [create a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and file your report there.
